description: This file defines a client-side storage class 'Store' for managing 'todo' items, including methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting data, and exports it to the global 'app' namespace.

classes.name: Store
classes.description: A constructor function for managing a collection of 'todo' items in client-side storage, with methods for CRUD operations.

methods.name: Store
methods.description: Constructor for creating a new storage instance with a specified name, initializing storage if it doesn't exist.

methods.name: find
methods.description: Finds items matching a query object and executes a callback with the results.

methods.name: findAll
methods.description: Retrieves all items in the collection and executes a callback with the data.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves or updates data in the collection; creates a new item if no ID is provided.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes an item by ID from the collection.

methods.name: drop
methods.description: Clears all storage data and resets the collection.
